tool_description: Check out our new Developer Portal and docs: https://www.flowcode.com/developer-portal
name: Flowcode
title: Flowcode

api_list.name: Create QR Code
api_list.description: This API takes an endpoint and return and image for a QR Code in either svg, png, jpg, or pdf format

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: This is the URL the QR code will scan to

required_parameters.name: imageType
required_parameters.description:
Response image type:
png, svg, pdf, or jpg

optional_parameters.name: bgColor
optional_parameters.description:
Hex background color for flowcode.
Format: #rrggbb or transparent for transparent background.

optional_parameters.name: fgColor
optional_parameters.description:
Hex foreground color for flowcode
Format: #rrggbb

optional_parameters.name: rimTextTop
optional_parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at top of the rim

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description:
Style of flowcode:
default, inset, or rim

optional_parameters.name: moduleShape
optional_parameters.description:
Shape to use for code pattern:
default, circle, square, or diamond

optional_parameters.name: rimTextBottom
optional_parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at bottom of the rim
